name: NWProtocolIP.Metadata
desc: Per-packet IP metadata you configure when sending and receiving packets.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Initializes an IP packet configuration with default settings.

items.name: var ecn: NWProtocolIP.ECN
items.desc: A specific Explicit Congestion Notification flag value to set on an IP packet.

items.name: enum NWProtocolIP.ECN
items.desc: Flag values for Explicit Congestion Notifications in IP packets.

items.name: var serviceClass: NWParameters.ServiceClass
items.desc: A specific service class to mark on an IP packet.

items.name: var receiveTime: UInt64
items.desc: The time at which a packet was received, in nanoseconds, based on CLOCK_MONOTONIC_RAW.
